hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: mkdir mosync-trunk 7z x MoSyncSrc.tar.bz2 7z x MoSyncSrc.tar -omosync-trunk

set MOSYNCDIR=%WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk ##cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk ##ruby workfile.rb base CONFIG=
cd %WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk/intlibs/idl-common ruby workfile.rb CONFIG= if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
cd %WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk/intlibs/filelist ruby workfile.rb CONFIG= if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
cd %WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk/tools/idl2 ruby workfile.rb CONFIG= if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
cd %WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk/tools/idl2 build\release\idl2 if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
cd %WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk/intlibs/bluetooth ruby workfile.rb CONFIG= if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%

set PATH=C:/MinGW32/bin;C:/msys/1.0/bin;%WORKSPACE%/mosync-trunk/tools/ReleasePackageBuild/build_package_tools/mosync_bin;%PATH%
junction C:\bd%BUILD_NUMBER% %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk cd C:\bd%BUILD_NUMBER%\tools\ConcurrentBuild ruby ConcurrentBuild.rb C:\bd%BUILD_NUMBER% C:\bd%BUILD_NUMBER% wm s60 if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% junction -d C:\bd%BUILD_NUMBER%
